content.raw:
It looks like kind of an awkward attempt to subvert the limitations of PIMPL while still pretending to be PIMPL.

Ultimately, this is not really a safe or reliable way of making a PIMPL class. I would strongly recommend removing it, and coming up with a different strategy (e.g. composition instead of inheritance) if this class needs to be extended somewhere.
